message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $12,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $8,000 for it. Would you consider reducing the price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $10,000?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet at $10,000. Would you consider lowering the price further to $9,000?
